thread.title: People Are Loving This Google Trick-Just Type 67 and Watch the Magic
thread.title_full: People Are Loving This Google Trick-Just Type 67 and Watch the Magic

author: Snehlata Sinha
title: People Are Loving This Google Trick-Just Type 67 and Watch the Magic
text:
Google Trick: We all use Google countless times a day. Sometimes for homework, sometimes for office work, and sometimes just to pass the time. But did you know that Google Baba isn’t just a treasure trove of information, he also has many ways of having fun? These days, the number ’67’ is making waves on the internet. People are saying that searching for it on Google brings something you never imagined. Let’s find out the truth behind this viral trick!
What’s the ’67’ thing?
If you type 67 or 6-7 into the Google search bar, your phone or computer screen suddenly starts shaking or vibrating. At first, anyone might be afraid the phone is damaged!
Don’t panic! This isn’t a malfunction of your device. In fact, it’s a new Easter Egg (a kind of hidden feature) from Google. Google often incorporates viral trends around the world into its search engine. This ‘shake’ effect is inspired by the “brainrot” memes and transition videos that recently went viral on social media.
How does this amazing trick work?
If you want to try it, just follow these steps:
Open google.com
Simply type 67 or 6-7 in the search box.
Now press ‘Enter’ or tap the search button.
Watch the magic! Your entire screen will shake like an earthquake for a few seconds.
Pro tip: This effect only lasts for a few moments, and then the screen automatically returns to normal. If the screen doesn’t stop shaking, refresh the page once, and everything will be fine.
Why does Google do this?
Google periodically introduces features like this to make its boring search image a little more cool and fun. Previously, features like ‘Do a barrel roll’ (making the screen spin) and ‘Thanos Snap’ (making search results disappear) have been quite popular. This ’67’ trick is becoming especially popular among youngsters and meme lovers.
A word of caution
This trick is completely safe and will not harm your data or device. This is a code created just for fun. So feel free to show it to your friends and surprise them!
